title.rendered: Does Crowd Sentiment Influence Volatility Forecast Models?

content.rendered:
Markets, cryptocurrency included, have always been influenced by the crowds of buyers and sellers that engage with them. Crowd sentiment and social sentiment have been discussed heavily for the past few years when it comes to the fortunes and forecasts of crypto markets in particular. But how can this data be harvested and used to improve the performance of ML models? Check out or Medium post to learn more.

Wisdom of the Crowd: Do the many know better than the few? >>
